appDesc.message: Decide whether to allow or block remote content in messages by comparing their folder names to regular expressions.

allowDescription.message: Regexp matching folder names in which remote content is allowed

blockDescription.message: Regexp matching folder names in which remote content should be blocked

scanRegexp.message: Regexp for folders to scan periodically

scanDescription.message: Regexp matching names of folders that should be scanned for new messages periodically

matchFolders.message: match a certain set of folder names
